Reviews.Title: works fine, came with the charger
Reviews.Author: Vinny-1001
Reviews.Content: got the used phone in a timely matter, it came in basic wear and tear condition, works fine, came with the charger.  only reason I am rating it low is because there are scratches on the screen, and I think the seller SHOULD 100% inform about screen scratches.  other little wear and tear stuff on the edges are given, and not an issue, but scratches on the screen should be noted..

Reviews.Title: Defective touch screen
Reviews.Author: pr
Reviews.Content: The touch screen "touch" was not aligned with icon. The touch screen became totally unresponsive after 2-days. The phone was defective right out of the box.  It was returned and the refund was quickly handled.  I bought my u820 replacement locally and the new phone works perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Good enough
Reviews.Author: Brett
Reviews.Content: I still use a dumbphone and this one has been great that is why I purchased another Realty to replace my old one that had the calibration go out on it.

Reviews.Title: Would be good .. If it worked
Reviews.Author: Tamara Shelton
Reviews.Content: The charger did not work. The phone battery was also defective. I returned this phone. It was disappointing because I bought this as a Christmas present for my daughter.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Oscar Madrid
Reviews.Content: I already had this phone but it broke needed a replacement without paying Verizon a lot of $$ for a new one.  Phone works fine and even though it said "used" it looks brand new to me.  Had a problem with the charger it came with but I still had my old one so its ok.
